099d8be5bd7bf0c46dcfcd59bfe17c8be90a0ac8.query:
SELECT id
			FROM `comic`
			WHERE id < ?
				AND (? is NULL OR `isGuestComic` = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR `isNonCanon` = ?)
			ORDER BY id DESC

0ecca89d72908c1f135bbaa50234d27a5185c625.query:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `occurences`
                WHERE
                    items_id = ?
                AND
                    comic_id = ?

1814764166a188d56021e20ebd446bb863ad7470.query: UPDATE `news` SET updateFactor = ?, lastUpdated = ? WHERE comic = ?

2a748260f18d5d68acca4bd3a3efd08a2c2defdc.query:
SELECT
				i.id,
				MIN(c.id) as first,
				MAX(c.id) as last,
				COUNT(c.id) as count
			FROM items i
			JOIN occurences o ON o.items_id = i.id
			JOIN comic c ON c.id = o.comic_id
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isGuestComic = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isNonCanon = ?)
			GROUP by i.id
			ORDER BY count DESC

2e13bcdeb002196f8d8fa9020070291696c65952.query:
SELECT id
			FROM `comic`
			WHERE id > ?
				AND (? is NULL OR `isGuestComic` = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR `isNonCanon` = ?)
			ORDER BY id ASC

2e81ec546b451349afa7844c923200ad5e73ebff.query:
SELECT
                MIN(comic_id) AS min,
                MAX(comic_id) AS max,
                COUNT(comic_id) AS count
            FROM `occurences`
            WHERE `items_id` = ?

33ce43c579db5bbeaaea7bb38784a576db95409c.query:
SELECT c.id
			FROM comic c
			WHERE (c.tagline IS NULL OR NULLIF(c.tagline, '') IS NULL)
				AND NOT c.HasNoTagline
				AND c.id < ?
				AND c.id > 3132
			ORDER BY c.id DESC
			LIMIT 1

38780619fca4cb1e771eb8a04f84ca05b273625e.query:
SELECT * FROM `comic`
			WHERE (? is NULL OR `isGuestComic` = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR `isNonCanon` = ?)
			ORDER BY id ASC

39c5a91c0c42a03aba88b8c2372c371ecdf3c579.query:
SELECT c.id
			FROM comic c
			WHERE c.id NOT IN
				(
					SELECT o.comic_id
					FROM occurences o
					LEFT JOIN items i ON o.items_id = i.id
					WHERE i.type = ?
					AND o.comic_id = c.id
					GROUP BY o.comic_id
				)
				AND (? <> 'cast' OR NOT c.HasNoCast)
				AND (? <> 'location' OR NOT c.HasNoLocation)
				AND (? <> 'storyline' OR NOT c.HasNoStoryline)
			ORDER BY c.id ASC
			LIMIT 1

3f6bbd2e56fa085bc1d820ffc3ca46aa7fa1d5f5.query:
UPDATE `comic`
            SET
                publishDate = ?,
                isAccuratePublishDate = ?
            WHERE
                id = ?

4027ec7983a1d8c0c7842be3324e8b6339f9a48a.query:
SELECT c.id
			FROM comic c
			WHERE c.id NOT IN
				(
					SELECT o.comic_id
					FROM occurences o
					LEFT JOIN items i ON o.items_id = i.id
					WHERE i.type = ?
					AND o.comic_id = c.id
					GROUP BY o.comic_id
				)
				AND (? <> 'cast' OR NOT c.HasNoCast)
				AND (? <> 'location' OR NOT c.HasNoLocation)
				AND (? <> 'storyline' OR NOT c.HasNoStoryline)
			ORDER BY c.id DESC
			LIMIT 1

465db772800dc53b00774ffd510be286fd407c10.query:
SELECT c.id
			FROM comic c
			WHERE (c.tagline IS NULL OR NULLIF(c.tagline, '') IS NULL)
				AND NOT c.HasNoTagline
				AND c.id > ?
				AND c.id > 3132
			ORDER BY c.id ASC
			LIMIT 1

694ee928b29e3b70424bcb0fa17978428c95dcef.query:
SELECT c.id
			FROM comic c
			WHERE (c.title IS NULL OR NULLIF(c.title, '') IS NULL)
				AND NOT c.HasNoTitle
				AND c.id < ?
			ORDER BY c.id DESC
			LIMIT 1

6a88e772c73c6b33d29de3a8e6ff022cc3030559.query: UPDATE `news` SET news = ?, updateFactor = ?, lastUpdated = ? WHERE comic = ?

6e5f4c138530b36fb2d0656b5e6e0f9d33271f79.query:
DELETE FROM `occurences`
            WHERE
                items_id = ?
            AND
                comic_id = ?

7039881ca69f3b38e5706d6a0482be276485d344.query:
SELECT i.*
            FROM items i
            JOIN occurences o ON o.items_id = i.id
            WHERE o.comic_id = ?

70cbe55689a58251bc76d7830b9ea70739845306.query:
SELECT i.id as id, MIN(c.id) as comic
			FROM items i
			JOIN occurences o ON o.items_id = i.id
			JOIN comic c ON c.id = o.comic_id
			WHERE c.id > ?
			AND i.id IN (
				SELECT items_id FROM `occurences` WHERE comic_id = ?
			)
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isGuestComic = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isNonCanon = ?)
			GROUP BY i.id

770de8b7383cd2edff70f70bb574a277f80e34ed.query:
SELECT
				i.id,
				MIN(c.id) as first,
				MAX(c.id) as last,
				COUNT(c.id) as count
			FROM items i
			JOIN occurences o ON o.items_id = i.id
			JOIN comic c ON c.id = o.comic_id
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isGuestComic = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isNonCanon = ?)
			WHERE i.id IN (
				SELECT items_id FROM `occurences` WHERE comic_id = ?
			)
			GROUP by i.id
			ORDER BY count DESC

7a0e3605403ea2f48a94f3a6dae17433ad029c3f.query:
SELECT c.id
			FROM comic c
			WHERE (c.title IS NULL OR NULLIF(c.title, '') IS NULL)
				AND NOT c.HasNoTitle
				AND c.id > ?
			ORDER BY c.id ASC
			LIMIT 1

844545af2fdb5b697c88a6c184fa0fcaa9224197.query:
SELECT i.id as id, MAX(c.id) as comic
			FROM items i
			JOIN occurences o ON o.items_id = i.id
			JOIN comic c ON c.id = o.comic_id
			WHERE c.id < ?
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isGuestComic = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isNonCanon = ?)
			GROUP BY i.id

8b6338c79ae6b17929555e9fcf61e026a9708b56.query:
SELECT c.id
			FROM comic c
			WHERE c.id NOT IN
				(
					SELECT o.comic_id
					FROM occurences o
					LEFT JOIN items i ON o.items_id = i.id
					WHERE i.type = ?
					AND o.comic_id = c.id
					GROUP BY o.comic_id
				)
				AND c.id > ?
				AND (? <> 'cast' OR NOT c.HasNoCast)
				AND (? <> 'location' OR NOT c.HasNoLocation)
				AND (? <> 'storyline' OR NOT c.HasNoStoryline)
			ORDER BY c.id ASC
			LIMIT 1

a8089cb7bd111263c364171c422bf9a04043c1f4.query:
UPDATE `items`
                    SET
                        Color_Red = ?,
                        Color_Green = ?,
                        Color_Blue = ?
                    WHERE
                        id = ?

b15e7e9138ea0e20f5b054dd1baaedf174297da9.query:
SELECT
    			MIN(c.id) as first,
    			MAX(c.id) as last
    		FROM comic c
    		WHERE (c.tagline IS NULL or NULLIF(c.tagline, '') IS NULL)
    			AND NOT c.HasNoTagline
    			AND c.id > 3132

b21dde653ea3c0848a16b7bb157bb842ff7e193d.query:
SELECT c.id
			FROM comic c
			WHERE c.id NOT IN
				(
					SELECT o.comic_id
					FROM occurences o
					LEFT JOIN items i ON o.items_id = i.id
					WHERE i.type = ?
					AND o.comic_id = c.id
					GROUP BY o.comic_id
				)
				AND c.id < ?
				AND (? <> 'cast' OR NOT c.HasNoCast)
				AND (? <> 'location' OR NOT c.HasNoLocation)
				AND (? <> 'storyline' OR NOT c.HasNoStoryline)
			ORDER BY c.id DESC
			LIMIT 1

ba3d8285266f3ed61a4ee85bff56674cee75c8f8.query:
SELECT
				MIN(c.id) as first,
				MAX(c.id) as last
			FROM comic c
			WHERE (c.title IS NULL or NULLIF(c.title, '') IS NULL)
				AND NOT c.HasNoTitle

bd1c915d1ac83b6c9e2392f38a1b57dd9092170c.query:
SELECT * FROM `log_entry`
            ORDER BY `DateTime` DESC
            LIMIT ?, 10

c103253d1d91c14547e81dd8ed47ec5301e73933.query:
INSERT INTO `comic`
                        (id, title, imagetype)
                    VALUES
                        (?, ?, ?)
                    ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
                        title = ?,
                        imagetype = ?

c484bf44f07f876938e3bf23c6719b9f3295cfed.query:
SELECT
                Id AS id,
                CRC32CHash AS crc32c_hash
            FROM `ItemImages`
            WHERE ItemId = ?

d449aeb9af2047c5d132dc9a87e922d71fd281fc.query:
SELECT
                i2.id,
                i2.shortName as short_name,
                i2.name,
                i2.type,
                i2.Color_Red as color_red,
                i2.Color_Green as color_green,
                i2.Color_Blue as color_blue,
                COUNT(i2.id) as count
            FROM items i
            JOIN occurences o ON i.id = o.items_id
            JOIN occurences o2 ON o.comic_id = o2.comic_id
            JOIN items i2 ON o2.items_id = i2.id
            WHERE i.id = ?
                AND i2.id <> i.id
                AND i2.type = ?
            GROUP BY i2.id
            ORDER BY count DESC
            LIMIT ?

da4359156507eab8fccedc0ca85db40fea61f6f7.query:
SELECT i.id as id, MIN(c.id) as comic
			FROM items i
			JOIN occurences o ON o.items_id = i.id
			JOIN comic c ON c.id = o.comic_id
			WHERE c.id > ?
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isGuestComic = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isNonCanon = ?)
			GROUP BY i.id

dce4380d9fd50223bae899fce266628efece8a05.query: INSERT INTO `news` (news, updateFactor, lastUpdated, comic) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

fd0b0214bad894af9b687d2db338458408378280.query:
SELECT i.id as id, MAX(c.id) as comic
			FROM items i
			JOIN occurences o ON o.items_id = i.id
			JOIN comic c ON c.id = o.comic_id
			WHERE c.id < ?
				AND i.id IN (
					SELECT items_id FROM `occurences` WHERE comic_id = ?
				)
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isGuestComic = ?)
				AND (? is NULL OR c.isNonCanon = ?)
			GROUP BY i.id
